channel.title: GarageGames: Recently Active Blogs
channel.description: Recently Active Blogs from GarageGames.com (keyword: activeblogs)

item.title: personalisierten Programm
item.description: Pelz und Frauen ist ein perfektes Spiel in den Himmel! Mehr SpiritualitÃï¿½Ãï¿½Â¤t, Pelz Braut charmante Braut im Winter mit einem Pelzmantel und voller Extravaganz.

item.title: Torque 2D On Android and Linux: Who wants it?
item.description: Greetings everyone! This is the last week to contribute to the Kickstarter campaign for bringing Torque 2D to Android Additionally, Max Gaming recently updated the rewards. Now, their work will also included support for Linux.

item.title: The Master's Eye - Part VI - After the Silence II
item.description: This is part VI of my blog regarding the development of my game The Master's Eye. It has been more than a year since my last blog about this project, so I hope you didn't forget me.

item.title: GMK is open source from now
item.description: GMK is a open-source product. Available on GitHub. GuideBot and GuideBot topology will follow.

item.title: Torque 2D: New Tutorials and Upcoming Features
item.description: In addition to the editor work, a lot of exciting work is going into Torque 2D. In this blog, I'll talk about R&D, iOS refactor, Leap Motion, Spine, Spriter, and amazing tutorials that are coming up.

item.title: Reduxed Get Reduxed ...
item.description: I'm beginning to hate that word ... We'll soon head to thesaurus.com to find a new one with the exact same meaning. Anhow, things which had been redone ... got redone ... for the umpteenth time ...

item.title: Japan Tokai Quake Predicted for late 2016 early 2017
item.description: I'm building an earthquake simulator based on historical quake data correlated with lunar and solar eclipses.

item.title: Forester Pro Version 1.15 Released
item.description: We've just released version 1.15 of Forester Pro, an easy to use tree creator for Torque3D. The new release addresses performance with creation and loading times 2-5x faster. For low and mid-spec systems you can disable shaders in Forester Pro for 2-4x fps.

item.title: Walkabout Release 1 Patch 2
item.description: Yes! A new patch for Walkabout, including everyone's favourite: support for large navmeshes. And then I talk some more about The Future.

item.title: How'd You Get Back In Here?!
item.description: It's been a long time since "The Cush" was hanging around, but he's finally managed to drag himself back.

item.title: Torque 3D Open Source Development Branch Update 2013-04-16
item.description: Time once again for another update for the open source development branch version of Torque 3D. Plus a cool video!

item.title: View the Aurora Borealis Using the Oculus Rift and Torque 3D
item.description: Take the Oculus Rift, Torque 3D, the aurora borealis as viewed from opposite sides of the Earth, and this is what you end up with.

item.title: T3D MIT port to IOS and Andriod
item.description:
T3D MIT port to IOS and Andriod
* separate server &amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp;amp; client * ios platform * android ndk build * tcp network for MMO * animation tool * game design tool * item system like a diablo3

item.title: Last week to contribute to the T2D Android Kickstarter.
item.description: We are down to the last week and still have a ways to go, if you have thought about donating please do it now to help us make our goal.

item.title: Torque 2D Editor Plan
item.description: Greetings everyone! Welcome back to another Torque 2D blog. This blog is dedicated to laying out the plans for creating editors for Torque 2D. We think we have some really good ideas, but since Torque 2D belongs to all of us, you should read and respond with your own opinion. Let's get to it!

item.title: BrokeAss Games Releases FBX to Torque Community!
item.description: Because I couldn't stand the guilt any longer... we've decided to throw our FBX code into the mix and see if we can get some collaboration on it!

item.title: THE TRENCH
item.description: The Trench is a first person shooter video game on PC taking place during the First World War. You assume the role of a French foot soldier mobilized on the Verdun front.

item.title: Torque 3D Now Supports the Oculus Rift
item.description: Today we announce support for the Oculus Rift head mounted display in the Torque 3D development branch on GitHub.

item.title: Uebergame - progress part 2 - start
item.description: Update part two Mainly worked on level design, but also took some time to put things up, so you can see it your own.

item.title: Dev Blog, DotNetTorque(DNT) 1.1 Service Release Notes
item.description: We are in the final passes of our first major update to DNT. As you all are familiar, DNT allows you to use any Microsoft Dot Net language instead of TorqueScript for the glue of the engine. Some of the feedback we have received from our license holders has included bug reports, feature requests and well to put it bluntly, make DNT more like traditional Object Oriented programming.
